pulse: TLDR: Neutral sentiment prevails as markets await further clarity on inflation and interest rate outlook. Key drivers include economic data releases, Fed policy signals, and corporate earnings. Tech and healthcare sectors show strength, while energy and financials lag. Geopolitical risks from Russia-Ukraine tensions and China-US relations persist. Institutional activity focused on defensive positioning. Political actions impacting markets include infrastructure spending debates and tax policy discussions. Stay vigilant for shifts in sentiment and adjust portfolios accordingly.
